content.text:
# IRB Chairman's Award

The '''IRB Chairman's Award''' was awarded by World Rugby until 2005.
List of winners

|-

!Name

|align=left| Kath McLean Sir Terry McLeanAlbert Farasse John Eales
|-
|2002
|align=left| Bill McLarenGeorge Pippos (posthumously)
|-
|2003
|align=left|  Vernon Pugh
|-
|2004
|align=left|  Marcel Martin
|-
|2005
|align=left| Sir Tasker Watkins V.C., G.B.E, D.L
|}
